overview: In 2004 and 2005, I made a filmed inventory of the streets and squares of Saint-Marcellin, in the Dauphiné. This movie is called: Across the Universe. In this film, each street and square was filmed in a single sequence shot and each of the plaques for these streets and squares is placed at the beginning of each street and square.  In order to offer a maximum of views of the city, here is Les Chutes de Saint-Marcellin, an appendix to Across the Universe which is made up of shots that were not retained for this film but which deserve to be kept and shown.
title: Les Chutes de Saint-Marcellin
